name: Kootenay Pass Ski Map & Guide
description: Map and guide designed for backcountry skiers and snowboarders. With years of backcountry experience and local knowledge, CAA professionals, ACMG/UIFMG members and GIS technicians teamed up to create this guide to Kootenay Pass. Includes 23 georeferenced routes with photographs, approach routes, avalanche terrain assessment scales, hut locations and more.
